explains: adj. 常绿的；经久不衰的
n. 常绿植物；经久不衰的人（或事物）
wordGroup: evergreen tree 常青树；冬青树

sentences.en: Plant evergreen shrubs around the end of the month.
sentences.cn: 大约在月末种植常绿灌木。

sentences.en: Many of these plants are evergreen, so you can enjoy them all year round.
sentences.cn: 这些植物中有许多都是四季常青的，所以可以全年观赏。

sentences.en: She has won two Academy Awards, one in 1976 as the composer of the Best Original Song, Evergreen.
sentences.cn: 她曾两次获得奥斯卡金像奖，一次是1976年《常青树》的最佳原著音乐奖。
